remove.title: Remove user?
remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the organization? Their coach and athlete profiles will also be removed.

ban.title: Ban User
ban.subtitle: Ban this user from the platform
ban.description: Ban {name} from the platform. They will not be able to sign in while banned.
ban.reasonPlaceholder: Enter the reason for banning this user...
ban.reasonDescription: This will be shown to the user when they try to sign in.
ban.expiresDescription: Leave empty for a permanent ban.

unban.title: Unban user?
unban.message: Are you sure you want to unban {name}? They will be able to sign in again.

resetMfaConfirm.title: Reset MFA?
resetMfaConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset MFA for {name}? They will need to set up two-factor authentication again.

resetPasswordConfirm.title: Reset password?
resetPasswordConfirm.message: A password reset email will be sent to {email}. The user will need to create a new password.

resendVerificationConfirm.title: Resend verification?
resendVerificationConfirm.message: The verification email will be resent to {email}.

modal.title: User Details
modal.noProfiles: This user has no coach or athlete profile.
modal.roleAutoAssigned: Users with coach or athlete profiles cannot have their role manually changed. The role is automatically assigned based on their profile.

formModal.createSubtitle: Add a new member to the organization
formModal.name: Name

error.passwordResetFailed: Failed to send password reset email.
